title: Őszinte leszek - Talkshow Osváth Zsolttal
overview: In the episodes of Őszinte leszek (I'll Be Honest), viewers can witness genuine exchanges of ideas where open-minded public figures, everyday people, and experts freely discuss topics such as artificial intelligence, food prices, bullying, or the urban-rural divide.Zsolt Osváth has already become known for sharing his honest opinions and staying true to himself, but in this show, his express goal is to spark thought-provoking conversations that encourage everyone to boldly share their own views, inspired by his insightful questions.
